name: Renee Baum
text: The pizza was awesome and the store personnel were polite, helpful, and knowledgeable!! We went in originally because of the awesome 50% discount for teachers offered in September, and they now have customers for life. Please go and try their fresh delicious pizzas üçï!!

name: Sorina Skov
text: Delicious pizza ! I loved the stuffed pizza.  I ordered thinking I was getting fresh hot pizza. They just make the pizza  , they don't cook it. The good thing about that is you can cook it the next day!

name: Hannah Norris
text: The food is fresh and the pizzas taste great. I really like their stuffed pizzas when I am really hungry and their thin crust pizzas for an every day choice. The thin crust pizzas have a lot of flavor and seem like a healthier option for a ‚Ä¶More

name: Jay G
text: First off I order from this place at least 2-3 times per week.  Sometimes the order is correct and sometimes it isn't but I don't usually get too worked up about it.  Tonight however my order was fixed incorrectly and my wife went in to get ‚Ä¶More

name: Authors Corner
text: I recently purchased pizza from Papa Murphy and I love the concept. The ingredients were fresh and prepared in front of my eyes and I walked out with four family size pizzas! Everyone loved the delicious pizzas....üòó

name: Lisa Burton
text: I absolutely love this place. Inexpensive pizza you bake at home so it‚Äôs always hot. Try the chicken Mediterranean, you won‚Äôt be disappointed!

name: Jennifer Bunch
text: The $9 pumpkin shapped pizza had no flavor.  In the past, the thin crust all veggie was good.

name: Chelsea DeLay
text: Pizza is delicious and very customizable! It's much cheaper than delivery pizza and the ingredients taste much fresher. The staff are always very friendly and quick too. Definitely my new favorite pizza spot!

name: Gabriel Place
text: I like coming here you get to bring it home and have it nice and hot

name: Melanie Fonville
text: I placed an order on line & when I went to pick it up they raised the price by $5.49 .  I asked them if I had paid by credit card online , would they have charged me the extra money & they said probably not . The 2 pizza's I ordered were ‚Ä¶More

name: Brad
text: The pizza is good but the service and staff are HORRIBLE.  They close at 8:00 but you better be there by 7:45 or they will refuse to serve you.  You also have to watch the checker when they ring up your order because they will ALWAYS try to ‚Ä¶More

name: Trey Norris
text: This place is great! There are healthy options and choice ingredients you just can't get with delivery pizza. My wife and kids especially love the herb chicken Mediterranean pizza. This is 'Za that the whole family can enjoy. ‚Ä¶More

name: Theresa Foster
text: Great, fresh, not frozen, handmade pizza without prepping it yourself.  They usually have a promotion in the weekly ads, and have a teacher discount sometimes too.  Just had their cookie dough last week.  It was very yummy.

name: Winterloves ice
text: Really good and fresh pizza! Prices sorta went up a bit but the quality is good!

name: Jeneal Southern
text: They're always prompt and kind when I order, even when they're busy.

name: Heather White
text: Great pizza and great staff!

name: Tara Hartsell
text: As soon as I walk in they do greet me but not very happy about it. Then I step up to order and the girl running the front register is arguing with another employee. That's fine things happen. Then they have NOTHING I repeat NOTHING..they ‚Ä¶More

name: Morgan Bell
text: You better have an oven because these excellent pizzas aren't served baked.

name: K Ramsey
text: $5 Faves are the way to go when you don't feel like cooking and the kiddos are hungry. I think they are pre-prepped. Got a cheese pizza a few days ago and it was pretty tasty.

name: Jeff R Brantley
text: Papa Murphy's in Lakeland, Tn is the best place to get your pizza from! ! The employees are sooooooo friendly and the General Manager,  Megan, is sooooooooooooooooo awesome, friendly and helpful! !!!!! We always buy our pizzas from this location and ONLY this location!!!

name: Sharon Mister
text: The service was horrible and was treated as if my business was not needed.  I will never visit this location again.

name: timothy brandon
text: This place is horrible. terrible owners and staff. employees regularly on drugs on the clock and young workers who really do not care. owner does drugs with the employees. so id think twice before trying lakeland and germantown locations. ‚Ä¶More

name: Edye Peck
text: Picked up a call in order.  Quick service and delicious pizza.

name: Van McClain
text: Great place to get a pizza! Order online or call it in, pick it up and bake it in your oven.

name: Lynn Jackson
text: I have always had a great experience at the Lakeland store, excellant Pizza I have been to Chicago at severial of there resturants and the ones at Papa Murphy are just as good if not better The Only time it was slow getting out of the store ‚Ä¶More

name: Johnny Cooper
text: Always great customer service and delicious pizza! I haven't bought frozen pizza nor have I ordered from any other chain in 2 years.

name: Sheila Hensley
text: Great pizza to bake at home. Fast service.

name: Brandy Wagner
text: Love it!  Get a cheese pizza and your favorite barbeque and do it your own way!

name: Lorenzo Green
text: Pizza was good service sucks

name: Raymond Carnahan
text: Good food good service

name: Chris Glover
text: Food stamp pizza. I pay 12$ for a pizza it better be cooked.

name: Tracey McCabe
text: I love Papa Murphy's some of the best pizza I've had in Memphis.

name: Terry Darnell Thomas
text: Luv it

name: Elizabeth Nelson
text: Amazing!

name: Nick S
text: Fast and friendly

name: Mary Beth Holmes
text: This place is Awesome

name: Stephanie Nurse
text: Great Pizza at an affordable price!!

name: Todd Connolly Parsons Tn
text: Walked in and was ignored by the two employees that was up front.  I was never even greeted so I left the store. Called the manager and told her they lost a customer.

name: Sarah C.
text: Not bad!
